Subject: Audio Devices
Description:
After deploying Endpoint Protector, multiple users have reported issues with audio devices (headsets, speakers, etc.), including being unable to select the correct audio source, the system not recognizing newly connected headsets, and displaying disconnected audio devices. Additionally, they are unable to open the Windows audio settings to set the default communication device. It seems that to resolve the issue, users need to restart the system after connecting a new audio device.

Is this expected behaviour?
Solution_Comment__c: resolved by applying the 5941 patch with the fix for audio devices.
